scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean; npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:test: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_test.js
scripts.deploy:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:bsc_test: NETWORK=bsc_test npx hardhat run --network bsc_test scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:bsc: NETWORK=bsc npx hardhat run --network bsc scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy_giveaway:polygon: NETWORK=polygon npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deploy_giveaway.js
scripts.deploy_giveaway:polygon_test: NETWORK=polygon_test npx hardhat run --network polygon_test scripts/deploy_giveaway.js
